Title: Horde Application Framework: XSS vulnerability
Synopsis:
The Horde Application Framework is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting
    vulnerability which could lead to the compromise of the victim's browser
    content.

Background.Text: The Horde Application Framework is a general-purpose web application framework written in PHP, providing classes for handling preferences, compression, browser detection, connection tracking, MIME, and more.

Description.Text: The Horde Team reported a potential XSS vulnerability. Horde fails to properly escape error messages which may lead to displaying unsanitized error messages via Notification_Listener::getMessage()

Impact.Text: By enticing a user to read a specially-crafted e-mail or using a manipulated URL, an attacker can execute arbitrary scripts running in the context of the victim's browser. This could lead to a compromise of the user's browser content.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
All Horde Application Framework users should upgrade to the latest
    version:
